publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3643 Cathie Craigie: Kilbowie Art and Design Exhibition—That the Parliament congratulates young people from various North Lanarkshire schools involved in the Kilbowie Art and Design course; supports the aims of the course which offer potential post-Higher and art school and college candidates the opportunity to identify and investigate source material in a visually stimulating environment; further congratulate the students on the quality of their work recently exhibited in Cumbernauld New Town Hall, and commends North Lanarkshire Council for its commitment to the course.
S2M-3643 Kilbowie Art and Design Exhibition (lodged on 28 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3643 Kilbowie Art and Design Exhibition (lodged on 28 November 2005) Carolyn Leckie*

S2M-3643 Cathie Craigie: Kilbowie Art and Design Exhibition—That the Parliament congratulates young people from various North Lanarkshire schools involved in the Kilbowie Art and Design course; supports the aims of the course which offer potential post-Higher and art school and college candidates the opportunity to identify and investigate source material in a visually stimulating environment; further congratulate the students on the quality of their work recently exhibited in Cumbernauld New Town Hall, and commends North Lanarkshire Council for its commitment to the course. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Carolyn Leckie
S2M-3643 Kilbowie Art and Design Exhibition (lodged on 28 November 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3643 Kilbowie Art and Design Exhibition (lodged on 28 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
